skein of each in colors… flip flop crustacean polished shell seaweed sedna tools - us size 19 15mm 32 or longer circular knitting needle - darning needle - scissors gauge 6 sts 9 row = 4 10 cm in st st after blocking adjust needle size if necessary to obtain the correct gauge color arranging and transition my throw transitions from yellow pink purple green to blue consider doing a similar color arrangement or even try dark to light to dark to transition between colors work until you have only enough to knit 4 more row in your working color attach the new color and work 2 row in the new color 2 row in the original color 2 row in the new color and lastly 2 row in the original color continue working in the new color until you have only enough to knit 4 more row 2 repeat the striping as
